Description: The user can take the "Salve" action to heal themselves for 10 HP.
The user can take the "Salve" action to heal themselves for 25 HP.
The user can take the "Salve" action to heal themselves for 50 HP.
The user can take the "Salve" action to remove all Poison Debuffs from themselves.
The user can take the "Salve" action to remove all Debuffs from themselves.
